html: 8.18.18  9:19 pm   Did you ever do car tests with the vine jingles?

8.18.18  9:02 pm   Hey. What inspired you to write "the stupid song"? (the first one)

      when I first listened to that song, I cried because I felt exactly the same way as you- someone- with no purpose- with nobody to help me. Desperately trying to find a reason to live or see the light of day. And it killed me hearing you sing about wanting somebody to help you through feeling bad. I needed someone so desperately in that moment, and I guess you were the one.

8.18.18  8:04 pm   Is hello sexy pants about love?

      Like you say, "Hello sexy pants" to a girl

      and she gets happy

      and then you say, "where'd you get those pants?" And then she gets mad

     and the rest of the lyrics is about anger

      and your trying to cheer her up promising to take her through the hills of France even though you only care about her pants and then she goes on live TV and Congress gets mad and the lights go black. Is that what it's about?

      If not, what's it about?
8.18.18  7:53 pm   how do you stay creative? So that everything you do is different but is "you".
8.18.18  7:47 pm   what do you think of YouTube monetization algorithms?

8.18.18  7:21 pm   Hey bill. I'm extremely sad. I fail a lot of the things I want to get good at. And my environment makes it hard for me to have hope and feel better about myself. I can't help but think that's no matter how hard I try to live a happy life, I'm going to fail and be extremely depressed forever. I'm extremely hopeless and tears are flowing from my eyes as I type this. I really want things to go better but I've been struggling for years. I'm trying so hard to calm myself down but I find it so hard... please- I'd really appreciate anything you can say to that you feel could help me.
8.18.18  6:59 pm   If something ways negative weight how much does it weigh?

8.18.18  6:59 pm   how do you keep organized when working on a large project (like hotewig)? there are so many moving parts (research, music, script, art) and they all interact with each other. i try to keep track of stuff in text files but then i end up either making 10,000 small text files or two or three giant ones both of which are completely unorganized. every time i try to impose order on them they just... unorganize themselves when the project changes direction as it inevitably does. how do you impose order without ruining the inherent messiness of the creative process?
8.18.18  6:38 pm   What is the best question to ask a celebrity?
8.18.18  6:26 pm   why haven't you written a book yet?

      The colors in your videos are extremely cool, but I don't want to believe that you are that deliberate and talented because that would make you an even more awesome artistperson than you already are, atleast for me.
